Detailed Description

Manifest information for a plugin's extension.

Member Function Documentation

UserMeetExtensionManifest::UserMeetExtensionManifest (  ) 

UserMeetExtensionManifest::createInstance ( $  instance_id = 0  ) 

Creates and loads a usable extension from a manifest record.

The object returned will be of type $class defined by the manifest. $instance_id is passed as an argument to uniquely identify multiple instances of an extension.

Parameters:
integer $instance_id
Returns:
object
